Summary: {nd} saw what looked like a baloon only it was moving slowly into the wind
divs: Sighting DetailsMy son ran into the house to tell me that there was something in the sky.So I went into the yard and sure enough there was.I ran back into the house and grabbed my phone.I took about 20 pictures of it.It is hard to see in picturIies but its there.It freaked us out cause it looked like a balloon only it was going into the wind.I don t have a clue to what it was.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Banning
There were no other sightings in Banning on or around September 29th 2012
